1.	Navigate to the main menu
2.	Select the "search" icon at the top right of the screen.
3.	Enter specifications to include in your search for a recipe.
4.	Select the desired recipe from the list displayed.

1.\tOpen the desired recipe by tapping on it.\n2.\tClick on icon in top right corner and select edit. Change applicable fields. (Note some may be required before you may progress).\n3.\tSelect save, which removes the outdated edition of your recipe, and replaces it with the corrected version.
If recipes can not be saved or edited:\n\tEnsure the device has stable internet connectivity.
